title: FaceMesh/Gesture Capture Control
description: Using mediapipe to detect face landmarks, pose gesture captures, and hand gesture captures to control volume.

title: Face expression recognition
description: Recognize facial expressions using OpenCV and Keras with a Convolutional Neural Network.

title: Movie Search Engine
description: A movie search engine that allows users to search for movies, actors, and genres. Employees can also add, delete, and update movies.
